pages.text: For the process of creating $(l:creating_onyx_shards)Black Shards$() you have developed a special construction. It is designed in a way to optimally bundle the magical energies of $(c_cyan)Topaz$(), $(c_magenta)Amethyst$() and $(c_yellow)Citrine$() and focuses them on a single, central point.

pages.name: Shrine Structure
pages.text: As always you are able to switch basalt with calcite and choose the gemstone blocks to your liking.
